name: 伝創記IV ~if~
description:
- Overview
1000 years has passed since the Holy Crusade.
This is a story woven by the ancestors of Heroic lineage.

Protagonist "Shin" is a young lad aiming to become a Doll Master.
In order to pass his graduation examination, he must up his skills.
Chloe takes him with her to investigate some ruins and gain some
real experience but... Resett is jealous of their relationship...

In the end, can Shin actually graduate successfully?
And what secrets lye within these ancient ruins?

- Characters
Shin: Aiming to become a Doll Master but his grades are not that good.
His mother was killed when he was still young which was a traumatic experience for him.

Chloe: Triple Master. A world wide top class hunter.
A friend of Shin's father, she has been tasked to look after him.

- System
Multiple protagonist story.
Form a party of up to 8 characters to take on your exploration adventures.
While it may be a numbering title. Can be enjoyed as a standalone product.

- Play time
Main Scenario:10~20 hours (not including sub events)
Extra Scenario: 10~20 hours (not including sub events)
* Sub events are for example, guild quests, colosseum tournament, etc

- Language
The English version was supported Ver 3.21e.
(The translator is Japanese native. Some event scenes use machine translation.)
If you do not switch to the English version, start the package properties from the library on Steam.
You can select English from the Language tab.
* A simple procedure is also posted on our website.
